entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:11 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 04:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -22.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -29.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
